title: [Sorcerer Guild, Alchemy Nexus]
description: Shelves line the east and west walls while entrances to the alchemical workrooms fan out to the north and south.  The ceiling and floors pulse in a slow, deliberate rhythm, their edges concealed by, or possibly composed of, an opaque black mist.  A circular work surface, fitted with mortars at each compass point, occupies the center of the room.
paths: Obvious exits: north, northeast, southeast, south, southwest, northwest, up
